00371 void ResetHeliSeats( )
00372 {
00373       gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied = 0;
00374 }
00375 
00376 void AddMercToHeli( UINT8 ubID )
00377 {
00378       INT32 cnt;
00379 
00380       if ( gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied < MAX_MERC_IN_HELI )
00381       {
00382             // Check if it already exists!
00383             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied; cnt++ )
00384             {
00385                   if ( gusHeliSeats[ cnt ] == ubID )
00386                   {
00387                         return;
00388                   }
00389             }
00390 
00391             gusHeliSeats[ gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied ] = ubID;
00392             gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied++;
00393       }
00394 }
00395 
00396 
00397 void StartHelicopterRun( INT16 sGridNoSweetSpot )
00398 {
00399       INT16 sX, sY;
00400 
00401       gsGridNoSweetSpot = sGridNoSweetSpot;
00402 
00403       if ( gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied == 0 )
00404       {
00405             return;
00406       }
00407 
00408       InterruptTime();
00409       PauseGame();
00410       LockPauseState( 20 );
00411 
00412       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sGridNoSweetSpot, &sX, &sY );
00413 
00414       gsHeliXPos                          = sX - ( 2 * CELL_X_SIZE );
00415       gsHeliYPos                          = sY - ( 10 * CELL_Y_SIZE );
00416       //gsHeliXPos                              = sX - ( 3 * CELL_X_SIZE );
00417       //gsHeliYPos                              = sY + ( 4 * CELL_Y_SIZE );
00418       gdHeliZPos                          = 0;
00419       gsHeliScript                        = 0;
00420       gbCurDrop                                 = 0;
00421       gbExitCount                         = 0;
00422       gbHeliRound                         = 1;
00423 
00424       gubHeliState                        = HELI_APPROACH;
00425       guiHeliLastUpdate       = GetJA2Clock( );
00426 
00427       // Start sound
00428       uiSoundSample = PlayJA2Sample( HELI_1, RATE_11025, 0, 10000, MIDDLEPAN );
00429       fFadingHeliIn                       = TRUE;
00430 
00431       gfHandleHeli                  = TRUE;
00432 
00433       gfFirstGuyDown          = TRUE;
00434 
00435       guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_BEGINUILOCK;
00436 }
00437 
00438 
00439 void HandleHeliDrop( )
00440 {
00441       UINT8 ubScriptCode;
00442       UINT32      uiClock;
00443       //INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
00444       INT32 iVol;
00445       INT32 cnt;
00446       ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
00447 
00448 
00449       if ( gfHandleHeli )
00450       {
00451             if ( gCurrentUIMode != LOCKUI_MODE )
00452             {
00453                   guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_BEGINUILOCK;
00454             }
00455 
00456             if ( _KeyDown( ESC ) )
00457             {
00458                   // Loop through all mercs not yet placed 
00459                   for ( cnt = gbCurDrop; cnt < gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied; cnt++ )
00460                   {
00461                         // Add merc to sector                     
00462                         MercPtrs[ gusHeliSeats[ cnt ] ]->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
00463                         UpdateMercInSector( MercPtrs[ gusHeliSeats[ cnt ] ], 9, 1, 0 );
00464 
00465                         // Check for merc arrives quotes...
00466                         HandleMercArrivesQuotes( MercPtrs[ gusHeliSeats[ cnt ] ] );
00467 
00468                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ MERC_HAS_ARRIVED_STR ], MercPtrs[ gusHeliSeats[ cnt ] ]->name );
00469 
00470                   }
00471 
00472                   // Remove heli
00473                   DeleteAniTile( gpHeli );
00474 
00475       RebuildCurrentSquad( );
00476 
00477                   // Remove sound
00478                   if( uiSoundSample!=NO_SAMPLE )
00479                   {
00480                         SoundStop( uiSoundSample );
00481                   }
00482 
00483                   gfHandleHeli = FALSE;
00484                   gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
00485                   gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied = 0;
00486                   UnLockPauseState();
00487                   UnPauseGame();
00488 
00489 
00490                   // Select our first guy
00491                   SelectSoldier( gusHeliSeats[ 0 ], FALSE, TRUE );
00492 
00493                   //guiCurrentEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
00494                   //gCurrentUIMode  = LOCKUI_MODE;
00495                   guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
00496                   //UIHandleLUIEndLock( NULL );
00497 
00498                   HandleFirstHeliDropOfGame( );
00499                   return;
00500 
00501             }
00502 
00503             gfIgnoreScrolling = TRUE;
00504 
00505             uiClock = GetJA2Clock( );
00506             
00507             if ( ( uiClock - guiHeliLastUpdate ) >  ME_SCRIPT_DELAY )
00508             {
00509                   guiHeliLastUpdate = uiClock;
00510 
00511                   if(fFadingHeliIn)
00512                   {
00513                         if( uiSoundSample!=NO_SAMPLE )
00514                         {
00515                               iVol=SoundGetVolume( uiSoundSample );
00516                               iVol=__min( HIGHVOLUME, iVol+5);
00517                               SoundSetVolume(uiSoundSample, iVol);
00518                               if(iVol==HIGHVOLUME)
00519                                           fFadingHeliIn=FALSE;
00520                         }
00521                         else
00522                         {
00523                               fFadingHeliIn=FALSE;
00524                         }
00525                   }
00526                   else if(fFadingHeliOut)
00527                   {
00528                         if( uiSoundSample!=NO_SAMPLE )
00529                         {
00530                               iVol=SoundGetVolume(uiSoundSample);
00531 
00532                               iVol=__max( 0, iVol-5);
00533 
00534                               SoundSetVolume(uiSoundSample, iVol);
00535                               if(iVol==0)
00536                               {
00537                                     // Stop sound
00538                                     SoundStop( uiSoundSample );
00539                                     fFadingHeliOut=FALSE;
00540                                     gfHandleHeli = FALSE;
00541                                     gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
00542                                     gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied = 0;
00543                                     guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
00544                                     UnLockPauseState();
00545                                     UnPauseGame();
00546 
00547             RebuildCurrentSquad( );
00548 
00549                                     HandleFirstHeliDropOfGame( );
00550                               }
00551                         }
00552                         else
00553                         {
00554                               fFadingHeliOut=FALSE;
00555                               gfHandleHeli = FALSE;
00556                               gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
00557                               gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied = 0;
00558                               guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
00559                               UnLockPauseState();
00560                               UnPauseGame();
00561 
00562           RebuildCurrentSquad( );
00563 
00564                               HandleFirstHeliDropOfGame( );
00565                         }
00566                   }
00567 
00568                   if ( gsHeliScript == MAX_HELI_SCRIPT )
00569                   {
00570                         return;
00571                   }
00572                   
00573                   ubScriptCode = ubHeliScripts[ gubHeliState ][ gsHeliScript ];
00574 
00575                   // Switch on mode...
00576                   if ( gubHeliState == HELI_DROP )
00577                   {
00578                         if ( !gfIngagedInDrop )
00579                         {
00580                               INT8 bEndVal;
00581 
00582                               bEndVal = ( gbHeliRound * NUM_PER_HELI_RUN );
00583 
00584                               if ( bEndVal > gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied )
00585                               {
00586                                     bEndVal = gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied;
00587                               }
00588 
00589                               // OK, Check if we have anybody left to send!
00590                               if ( gbCurDrop < bEndVal )
00591                               {
00592                                     //sWorldX = CenterX( gsGridNoSweetSpot );
00593                                     //sWorldY = CenterY( gsGridNoSweetSpot );
00594                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( MercPtrs[ gusHeliSeats[ gbCurDrop ] ], HELIDROP, 0 , FALSE );
00595 
00596                                     // Change insertion code
00597                                     MercPtrs[ gusHeliSeats[ gbCurDrop ] ]->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
00598 
00599                                     UpdateMercInSector( MercPtrs[ gusHeliSeats[ gbCurDrop ] ], 9, 1, 0 );
00600                                     //EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( MercPtrs[ gusHeliSeats[ gbCurDrop ] ], sWorldX, sWorldY );
00601 
00602                                     // IF the first guy down, set squad!
00603                                     if ( gfFirstGuyDown )
00604                                     {
00605                                           gfFirstGuyDown = FALSE;
00606                                           SetCurrentSquad( MercPtrs[ gusHeliSeats[ gbCurDrop ] ]->bAssignment, TRUE );                                      
00607                                     }
00608                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ MERC_HAS_ARRIVED_STR ], MercPtrs[ gusHeliSeats[ gbCurDrop ] ]->name );
00609 
00610                                     gbCurDrop++;
00611 
00612                                     gfIngagedInDrop = TRUE;
00613                               }
00614                               else
00615                               {
00616                                     if( gbExitCount == 0 )
00617                                     {
00618                                           gbExitCount = 2;
00619                                     }
00620                                     else
00621                                     {
00622                                           gbExitCount--;
00623 
00624                                           if ( gbExitCount == 1 )
00625                                           {
00626                                                 // Goto leave 
00627                                                 gsHeliScript                        = -1;
00628                                                 gubHeliState                        = HELI_ENDDROP;
00629 
00630                                           }
00631                                     }
00632                               }
00633                         }
00634                   }
00635 
00636                   switch( ubScriptCode )
00637                   {
00638                         case HELI_REST:
00639 
00640                               break;
00641 
00642                         case HELI_MOVE_DOWN:
00643 
00644                               gdHeliZPos -= 1;
00645                               gpHeli->pLevelNode->sRelativeZ = ( INT16 )gdHeliZPos;
00646                               break;
00647 
00648                         case HELI_MOVE_UP:
00649 
00650                               gdHeliZPos += 1;
00651                               gpHeli->pLevelNode->sRelativeZ = ( INT16 )gdHeliZPos;
00652                               break;
00653 
00654                         case HELI_MOVESMALL_DOWN:
00655 
00656                               gdHeliZPos -= 0.25;
00657                               gpHeli->pLevelNode->sRelativeZ = ( INT16 )gdHeliZPos;
00658                               break;
00659 
00660                         case HELI_MOVESMALL_UP:
00661 
00662                               gdHeliZPos += 0.25;
00663                               gpHeli->pLevelNode->sRelativeZ = ( INT16 )gdHeliZPos;
00664                               break;
00665 
00666 
00667                         case HELI_MOVEY:
00668 
00669                               gpHeli->sRelativeY += 4;
00670                               break;
00671 
00672                         case HELI_MOVELARGERY:
00673 
00674                               gpHeli->sRelativeY += 6;
00675                               break;
00676 
00677                         case HELI_GOTO_BEGINDROP:
00678 
00679                               gsHeliScript                        = -1;
00680                               gubHeliState                        = HELI_BEGINDROP;
00681                               break;
00682 
00683                         case HELI_SHOW_HELI:
00684 
00685                               // Start animation
00686                               memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
00687                               AniParams.sGridNo                                     = gsGridNoSweetSpot;
00688                               AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_SHADOW_LEVEL;
00689                               AniParams.sDelay                                      = 90;
00690                               AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
00691                               AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_LOOPING;
00692                               AniParams.sX                                                      = gsHeliXPos;
00693                               AniParams.sY                                                      = gsHeliYPos;
00694                               AniParams.sZ                                                      = (INT16)gdHeliZPos;
00695                               strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\HELI_SH.STI" );
00696 
00697                               gpHeli = CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
00698                               break;
00699 
00700                         case HELI_GOTO_DROP:
00701 
00702                               // Goto drop animation
00703                               gdHeliZPos -= 0.25;
00704                               gpHeli->pLevelNode->sRelativeZ = ( INT16 )gdHeliZPos;
00705                               gsHeliScript                        = -1;
00706                               gubHeliState                        = HELI_DROP;
00707                               break;
00708 
00709                         case HELI_GOTO_MOVETO:
00710 
00711                               // Goto drop animation
00712                               gsHeliScript                        = -1;
00713                               gubHeliState                        = HELI_MOVETO;
00714                               break;
00715 
00716                         case HELI_GOTO_MOVEAWAY:
00717 
00718                               // Goto drop animation
00719                               gsHeliScript                        = -1;
00720                               gubHeliState                        = HELI_MOVEAWAY;
00721                               break;
00722 
00723                         case HELI_GOTO_EXIT:
00724 
00725                               if ( gbCurDrop < gbNumHeliSeatsOccupied )
00726                               {
00727                                     // Start another run......
00728                                     INT16 sX, sY;
00729 
00730                                     ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( gsGridNoSweetSpot, &sX, &sY );
00731 
00732                                     gsHeliXPos                          = sX - ( 2 * CELL_X_SIZE );
00733                                     gsHeliYPos                          = sY - ( 10 * CELL_Y_SIZE );
00734                                     gdHeliZPos                          = 0;
00735                                     gsHeliScript                        = 0;
00736                                     gbExitCount                         = 0;
00737                                     gubHeliState                        = HELI_APPROACH;  
00738                                     gbHeliRound++;
00739 
00740                                     // Ahh, but still delete the heli!
00741                                     DeleteAniTile( gpHeli );
00742                                     gpHeli = NULL;
00743                               }
00744                               else
00745                               {
00746                                     // Goto drop animation
00747                                     gsHeliScript                        = -1;
00748                                     gubHeliState                        = HELI_EXIT;
00749 
00750                                     // Delete helicopter image!
00751                                     DeleteAniTile( gpHeli );
00752                                     gpHeli = NULL;
00753                                     gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
00754 
00755                                     // Select our first guy
00756                                     SelectSoldier( gusHeliSeats[ 0 ], FALSE, TRUE );
00757                               }
00758                               break;
00759 
00760                         case HELI_DONE:
00761 
00762                               // End
00763                               fFadingHeliOut                = TRUE;
00764                               break;
00765                   }
00766 
00767                   gsHeliScript++;
00768 
00769             }
00770       }
00771 }
00772 
00773 
00774 void BeginMercEntering( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo )
00775 {
00776       ResetHeliSeats( );
00777 
00778       AddMercToHeli( pSoldier->ubID );
00779 
00780 
00781       StartHelicopterRun( sGridNo );
00782 
00783       // Make sure AI does nothing.....
00784       PauseAIUntilManuallyUnpaused();
00785 }

00787 
00788 void HandleFirstHeliDropOfGame( )
00789 {
00790       // Are we in the first heli drop?
00791       if ( gfFirstHeliRun )
00792       {
00793             SyncStrategicTurnTimes();
00794 
00795             // Call people to area
00796             CallAvailableEnemiesTo( gsGridNoSweetSpot );
00797 
00798             // Say quote.....
00799             SayQuoteFromAnyBodyInSector( QUOTE_ENEMY_PRESENCE );
00800 
00801             // Start music
00802             SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_ENEMYPRESENT );          
00803 
00804             gfFirstHeliRun = FALSE;
00805             
00806       }
00807 
00808       // Send message to turn on ai again....
00809       CharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( 0, 0,   0 , DIALOGUE_TACTICAL_UI , FALSE , FALSE , DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_ENABLE_AI ,0, 0 );
00810 
00811 }
